title: how to acces blocked league
body: school blocked league, theres already a vpn automatically installed onto the wifi, because im in china. so i basically need 2 vpns to play league resulting in a 900 ping, sny suggestions on how to lower the ping? im in a boarding school, so not playing for a year is not optional, pls help.

replies.body: I'm not sure what offer I can advise in addition to what you've already tried out.  Your best bet would be to reach out to your IT and ask for an allowance to let League through.  Hopefully, they'll be willing to help out with that!
idk even where the hell, the the IT room is....

Go to the IT department and say "ill do anything to play league sir, ANYTHING"

works in movies all the time
